levels.description:
ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, attacks create a layer of sticky liquid within Attack Range that lasts for {attack@projectile_life_time} seconds. Ground enemies passing over the sticky liquid have Movement Speed <@ba.vup>{attack@move_speed:0%}</> and DEF <@ba.vup>{attack@def}</> (Does not stack). <$ba.charged>Charged</> effect: Changes to {attack@another_trigger_time} ammo
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants {attack@trigger_time} ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>
